items.sentence: Let\'s hope we don\'t have to do this again.
It looks like Tom is getting ready to leave.
Tom saw someone standing outside his window.
I don\'t feel like doing anything right now.
I don\'t have many opportunities to do that.
Tom pretended not to know what had happened.
You forgave Tom for doing that, didn\'t you?
You had to give it back to Tom, didn\'t you?
Everybody except Tom knew what was going on.
Don\'t you think you\'d like to work for me?
Don\'t you think you\'d like to work for us?
Don\'t you think you\'ll be able to help me?
Don\'t you understand what\'s at stake here?
Tom could do that for you, I\'m pretty sure.
Tom and Mary probably didn\'t sing together.
Tom shut one window and Mary shut the other.
Tom smiled apologetically and left the room.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary thought about it.
I think you should buy yourself a new phone.
I thought that something was wrong with Tom.
